biotools.summary: It infers the proportions of a priori known cell subtypes present in a sample representing a mixture of such cell-types. Inference proceeds via one of 3 methods (Robust Partial Correlations-RPC, Cibersort (CBS), Constrained Projection (CP)), as determined by user.

bioschemas.name: EpiDISH
bioschemas.summary: It infers the proportions of a priori known cell subtypes present in a sample representing a mixture of such cell-types. Inference proceeds via one of 3 methods (Robust Partial Correlations-RPC, Cibersort (CBS), Constrained Projection (CP)), as determined by user.
